item.description: MetalLB 自建k8s的 loadbalancer https://www.lixueduan.com/posts/cloudnative/01-metallb/ https://www.bboy.app/2021/01/11/metallb%E9%83%A8%E7%BD%B2%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8/ https://ieevee.com/tech/2019/06/30/metallb.html https://cloud.tencent.com/developer/article/2146391#:~:text=%E9%83%A8%E7%BD%B2%E5%AE%89%E8%A3%85,Metallb%E6%94%AF%E6%8C%81%E9%80%9A%E8%BF%87Kuberntes%E6%B8%85%E5%8D%95%E3%80%81Helm%E5%92%8CKustomize%E6%96%B9%E5%BC%8F%E8%BF%9B%E8%A1%8C%E9%83%A8%E7%BD%B2%EF%BC%8C%E6%9C%AC%E6%96%87%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E5%B0%86%E4%BB%A5Kuberntes%E6%B8%85%E5%8D%95%E4%B8%BA%E4%BE%8B%E4%BB%8B%E7%BB%8D%E4%BA%A7%E5%93%81%E7%9A%84%E9%83%A8%E7%BD%B2%E5%AE%89%E8%A3%85%EF%BC%8C%E9%83%A8%E7%BD%B2%E7%9A%84%E7%89%88%E6%9C%AC%E4%B8%BA%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E7%9A%84v0.13.4%E3%80%82 简介 在Kubernetes部署完成服务后，我们经常需要将服务开放给到外部用户访问 。如果是使用云平台（阿里云、腾讯云、
